full_summary:
### Public Procurement Notice

#### title: 
Catering Services for RCMP - North District of BC

#### number:
PW-23-01029804

#### announcement date:

March 10, 2023

#### closing date and time:
April 12, 2023, at 05:00 PM (Toronto Time)

#### description: 
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a catering service provider for the RCMP North District of British Columbia. The contract period is one year, with an irrevocable option to extend it for two additional one-year periods. The services are required on an "as and when requested" basis.

#### Tender Requirements: 
Tenders must be submitted electronically through the Canada Electronic Tendering Service (buyandsell.gc.ca) or by mail to the RCMP “E” DIVISION BID RECEIVING FRONT DESK Mail Stop # 1004 14200 Green Timbers Way Surrey, BC V3T 6P3. 

#### Evaluation Criteria:
The selection will be based on the lowest evaluated price. 

#### Contract Requirements:
The two-page document attached to this notice contains all the requirements of the tender package.

#### Additional Information: 
Canada follows the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. Parties to the bid must acknowledge that they are acceptably politically neutral, they will comply with relevant laws relating to bribery of public officials, and they will not corrupt any government employee. Details about this can be found in the attached tender document. 

#### Contact Information:
Gursharn Dhadwal 
Contact Information: 
 Phone: None
 Email: gursharn.dhadwal@rcmp-grc.gc.ca 
 Mail: RCMP “E” DIVISION, PROCUREMENT & CONTRACTING 14200 GREEN TIMBERS WAY L/S 106 Surrey, BC V3T 6P3

#### Attachments:
[ Please click the link below to download the attached tender documents]( https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/10/188306cf7c6b5480db640dddf17575d4/fr_rfp_catering_service_for_rcmp-north_district_of_bc.pdf)

Please note: the tendering documents will contain and specify the exact information that the bidders must fulfill, including more information about evaluation criteria, contract period, and all relevant legal requirements.
